nodes.title: Potion Seller's Shop
nodes.description: You approach a dimly lit shop, known across the land for its potent potions. The air is thick with the scent of herbs and mystery.

nodes.title: Leaving the Shop
nodes.description: You exit the Potion Seller's shop, the door creaking shut behind you. The world awaits your next adventure.

nodes.title: Healing Potions
nodes.description: The shopkeeper shows you a shelf of red potions. 'These can cure any wound,' he says.

choices.name: Buy a small healing potion (10 gold)

nodes.title: Mana Potions
nodes.description: Glowing blue vials catch your eye. 'Perfect for restoring magical energy,' the keeper explains.

nodes.title: Strength Potions
nodes.description: The shopkeeper flexes his arm and points to green potions. 'With this, you could lift a mountain,' he brags.

nodes.title: Browsing the Shelves
nodes.description: You see rows of potions with labels like 'Healing', 'Mana', and 'Strength'.

choices.name: Ask the shopkeeper about rare potions

nodes.title: Rare Potions
nodes.description: The shopkeeper grins mischievously. 'Ah, you have a keen eye. Let me show you something special.'

choices.name: Look at the Elixir of Eternity

nodes.title: Elixir of Eternity
nodes.description: A golden liquid swirls endlessly inside the bottle. 'This grants immortality, but at what cost?' the shopkeeper warns.

nodes.title: Potion of Luck
nodes.description: A shimmering green potion sparkles. 'Drink this, and fortune will always favor you,' the shopkeeper assures.

nodes.title: The Cursed Potion
nodes.description: The shopkeeper hesitates before revealing a dark, swirling potion. 'This is not for the faint-hearted. It brings great power but also... challenges.'

nodes.title: Small Healing Potion
nodes.description: You purchase the potion and feel prepared for your next adventure.

nodes.title: Mana Potion
nodes.description: You buy the mana potion and feel your magical reserves surge.

nodes.title: Strength Potion
nodes.description: With this potion, you feel like you could conquer any physical challenge.

nodes.title: Elixir of Eternity
nodes.description: The shopkeeper warns you as you leave, 'Eternity is a long time. Choose your actions wisely.'

choices.name: Step outside and begin your eternal adventure

nodes.title: Potion of Luck
nodes.description: You feel a strange shift in the air around you, as if the universe now bends slightly in your favor.

nodes.title: The Cursed Potion
nodes.description: A chill runs down your spine as you take the potion. The shopkeeper smirks, 'Good luck... you'll need it.'

nodes.title: A Knight's Request
nodes.description: You enter the potion shop seeking the strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Hello, Potion Seller, I am going into battle and I want your strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: My potions are too strong for you, traveler.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, I tell you I am going into battle, and I want only your strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: You can't handle my potions. They're too strong for you.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, listen to me; I want only your strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: My potions would kill you, traveler. You cannot handle my potions.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, enough of these games. I'm going into battle and I need your strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: My strongest potions would kill you, traveler. You can't handle my strongest potions. You'd better go to a seller that sells weaker potions.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, I'm telling you right now; I'm going into battle and I need only your strongest potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: You don't know what you ask, traveler. My strongest potions will kill a dragon, let alone a man. You need a seller that sells weaker potions, because my potions are too strong.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, I'm telling you I need your strongest potions. I'm going into battle! I'm going to battle and I need your strongest potions!

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: You can't handle my strongest potions! No one can! My strongest potions aren't fit for a beast let alone a man.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Potion Seller, what do I have to tell you to get your potions? Why won't you trust me with your strongest potions, Potion Seller? I need them if I'm to be successful in the battle!

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: I can't give you my strongest potions because my strongest potions are only for the strongest beings and you are of the weakest.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: Well then that's it, Potion Seller. I'll go elsewhere. I'll go elsewhere for my potions.

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: That's what you'd better do.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: I'll go elsewhere for my potions and I'll never come back!

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: Good. You're not welcome here! My potions are only for the strongest and you're clearly are not of the strongest you're clearly the weakest.

dialogue.speaker: Knight
dialogue.text: You've had your say, Potion Seller but I'll have mine. You're a rascal, you're a rascal with no respect for knights. No respect for anything... except your potions!

dialogue.speaker: Potion Seller
dialogue.text: Why respect knights... when my potions can do anything that you can.

nodes.title: Leaving the Shop
nodes.description: You leave the Potion Seller's shop, frustrated and empty-handed. Perhaps another merchant will aid you in your quest.
